explanation: Securely overwrites and deletes rotated Nginx log files in place to prevent recovery while leaving active logs intact.
rationale_steps: Select only rotated Nginx logs (*.log.*) to minimize collateral impact.
Use xargs to pass exact filenames to wipe, preserving spaces and special characters via -print0/-0.
wipe overwrites file contents with multiple passes and then unlinks the files for irreversible destruction.
